text:
Holy shit, I remember this game! I'd completely forgotten about it, I couldn't even remember the name... Oh man, so many memories. This and the sequel, I played the crap out of with my big brother back when we were really little... I never could beat him, but I always secretly practiced in hopes I would get better than him someday. Damnit, nostalgia..
Thanks, SupraDarky, I wouldn't have remembered this game if it wasn't for your list. x3
